医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
没有嗅觉的人呼吸的改变可以解释健康问题研究表明，嗅觉丧失症患者的呼吸模式发生了改变，将嗅觉丧失与健康问题联系起来，并强调了嗅觉在呼吸中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Altered-breathing-in-those-without-a-sense-of-smell-could-explain-health-issues.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Altered-breathing-in-those-without-a-sense-of-smell-could-explain-health-issues.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f4afff0-c7dc-44bc-8f5a-097e1be801f5 Tue, 22 Oct 2024 12:00:00 -0400 Altered breathing in those without a sense of smell could explain health issues
新研究揭示 GPR31 在肠道感染免疫反应中的作用大阪大学的研究人员发现，“肠道监视”细胞中的 GPR31 路径可以检测细菌代谢物并触发免疫反应，为药物开发、疫苗和益生菌对抗感染开辟新的可能性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/New-research-reveals-GPR31s-role-in-immune-response-to-gut-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/New-research-reveals-GPR31s-role-in-immune-response-to-gut-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c4f33925-b373-4929-a316-68ff83c04af6 Tue, 22 Oct 2024 10:01:00 -0400 New research reveals GPR31's role in immune response to gut infections
了解心理困扰对日本预期寿命的影响日本人口以其出生时预期寿命（LE）最长而闻名。人们对日本人口的身体健康状况进行了广泛的研究，主要是死亡率结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Understanding-the-impact-of-psychological-distress-on-life-expectancy-in-Japan.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Understanding-the-impact-of-psychological-distress-on-life-expectancy-in-Japan.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5ab89d81-01cf-42d2-83ff-ba0f6a4383a9 Tue, 22 Oct 2024 09:25:00 -0400 Understanding the impact of psychological distress on life expectancy in Japan
新细菌毒素的发现为新型感染治疗开辟了道路研究人员发现了一组新的细菌毒素，可以杀死有害细菌和真菌，为潜在的感染新疗法打开了大门。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Discovery-of-new-bacterial-toxins-opens-path-to-novel-infection-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Discovery-of-new-bacterial-toxins-opens-path-to-novel-infection-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a793f855-1ade-4bf3-b275-e241894bcb12 Tue, 22 Oct 2024 09:16:51 -0400 Discovery of new bacterial toxins opens path to novel infection treatments
INTEGRA Biosciences 的移液器有助于小分子抑制剂从发现到临床试验的进展位于美国旧金山的 RAPT Therapeutics 依靠 INTEGRA Biosciences 的移液器无缝加速其用于治疗炎症性疾病和癌症的候选小分子抑制剂的开发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/INTEGRA-Biosciencese28099-pipettes-help-progress-small-molecule-inhibitors-from-discovery-to-clinical-Trials.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/INTEGRA-Biosciencese28099-pipettes-help-progress-small-molecule-inhibitors-from-discovery-to-clinical-Trials.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=217d7429-372f-4c8f-9d16-d1c53ca19f94 Tue, 22 Oct 2024 08:33:00 -0400 INTEGRA Biosciences’ pipettes help progress small molecule inhibitors from discovery to clinical trials
AI 模型与眼科医生诊断感染性角膜炎相匹配眼科护理专家可以看到人工智能有助于诊断感染性角膜炎（IK），这是全球角膜失明的主要原因，一项新研究发现深度学习模型在识别感染方面表现出相似的准确度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/AI-models-match-o眼科医生-in-diagnosing-infectious-keratitis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/AI-models-match-ohavingmologies-in-diagnosing-infectious-keratitis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=428e04e9-4cd9-4193-aa84-2e15d877b611 Tue, 22 Oct 2024 08:32:27 -0400 AI models match ophthalmologists in diagnosing infectious keratitis
新研究揭示了冠状病毒如何逃避免疫防御新型冠状病毒 SARS-CoV-2 具有一种酶，可以抵消细胞对病毒的先天防御机制，这解释了为什么它比以前引起 SARS 和 MERS 的病毒更具传染性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/New-research-uncovers-how-coronavirus-evades-immune-defense.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/New-research-uncovers-how-coronavirus-evades-immune-defense.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9d38fd22-4c6d-4557-a328-45aa6f7c548a Tue, 22 Oct 2024 08:27:00 -0400 New research uncovers how coronavirus evades immune defense
Optibrium 展示了针对小分子和大环化合物的卓越分子对接方法Optibrium 是一家领先的分子设计软件和人工智能解决方案开发商，今天宣布在《计算机辅助分子设计杂志》上发表一项同行评审研究，题为“基于结构的姿势预测：非同源对接扩展到大环配体”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Optibrium-demonstrates-superior-molecular-docking-method-for-small-molecules-and-macrocycles.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Optibrium-demonstrates-superior-molecular-docking-method-for-small-molecules-and-macrocycles.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b8abc6ec-199a-4e99-9d26-a42116de2cf3 Tue, 22 Oct 2024 08:08:00 -0400 Optibrium demonstrates superior molecular docking method for small molecules and macrocycles
THELMA 项目研究算法监测对女性生殖健康的影响在人口下降的背景下，生殖健康的算法监测可用于秘密控制生殖决策，加剧不平等并侵犯妇女权利。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/THELMA-project-examines-impact-of-algorithmic-surveillance-on-womens-reproductive-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/THELMA-project-examines-impact-of-algorithmic-surveillance-on-womens-reproductive-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e37d5844-773b-4f00-ac3b-056fab5a74b1 Tue, 22 Oct 2024 07:54:34 -0400 THELMA project examines impact of algorithmic surveillance on women's reproductive health
在家进行脑刺激疗法可减轻严重抑郁症状这项研究强调了家庭 tDCS 在治疗重度抑郁症方面的功效，可显着改善抑郁症状并缓解抑郁症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Brain-stimulation-therapy-at-home-reduces-major-depression-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Brain-stimulation-therapy-at-home-reduces-major-depression-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=26a005f7-11bb-4c2f-9945-0ecca03f59c2 Tue, 22 Oct 2024 07:45:00 -0400 Brain-stimulation therapy at home reduces major depression symptoms
